original_text: And he saw them toiling in rowing; for the wind was contrary unto them: and about the fourth watch of the night he cometh unto them, walking upon the sea, and would have passed by them.
korean_text: 바람이 거스르므로 제자들이 힘겹게 노 젓는 것을 보시고 밤 사경쯤에 바다 위로 걸어서 그들에게 오사 지나가려고 하시매

sentences.original_text: And he saw them toiling in rowing
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 그가 그들이 노 젓는 힘겨워하는 것을 보았다

sentences.original_text: for the wind was contrary unto them
And about the fourth watch of the night
he cometh unto them, walking upon the sea
sentences.korean_translation: 그가 바다 위를 걸어 그들에게 왔다

sentences.original_text: and would have passed by them
